title: Did Obama's campaign use the same tactics as Cambridge Analetika?
subtitle: Attempts at "what about orientation" with a scandal involving social media and psychology do not recognize that Cambridge Analetika has obtained data by misleading people.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: The 2008 and 2012 Barack Obama presidential campaigns used the same tactics and techniques criticized by Cambridge Analetika and the 2018 Trump campaign.
